授業目的: This seminar continues the discussion of Japanese contemporary popular culture, such as: anime, manga, games, light novels, film, etc. The emphasis will be placed on the individual projects and group discussions of the methodology, such as media studies, gender studies, pop culture studies, etc. Group discussions and individual presentations will supplement reading materials and lectures.
到達目標: This course teaches how to apply methodological tools to the analysis of specific media when writing an academic paper and Bachelor's thesis.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
The class will be conducted face-to-face in a designated classroom. For students who registered for online class, the class will be provided simultaneously via zoom.
This course emphasizes group-work, discussions, and presentations.
